# Disabled Account or Removed Computer in AD


<br /><div style="clear: right; float: right; margin-bottom: 1em; margin-left: 1em;">They all have this RED ball with Cross on it. For computers, once you rejoin it into the AD, the RED ball with cross disappear. <img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," /></div><br /><br /><br /><br /><br /><br /><br />
